1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Contender in the first episode was Sinisa Stetin who managed to beat resident host Milan Kalinic and win initial money prize.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Contender in the second episode was Uros Pilipovic who didn't manage to beat resident host Milan Kalinic.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Contender in the third episode was Vladimir Markovic who didn't manage to beat resident host Milan Kalinic.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Contender in the fourth episode was Nikola Kovacev who managed to beat resident host Milan Kalinic and win biggest money prize so far.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Contender in the fifth episode was Nikola Barac who managed to beat resident host Milan Kalinic.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Contender in the fifth episode was Milos Djordjevic.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot:

 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: In each episode, one of 5 initial candidates was randomly chosen to confront resident host, famous Serbian actor Milan Kalinic. There were 15 games per episode varying from intellectual quiz games, typical sports, pub games to unusual challenges. Most of the games were not repeated over the episodes making each show quite unpredictable. With each victory, the winner of particular game would score certain amount of points corresponding to the overall order of that game in the show (1st game=1 point). The show was over when one of the contestants managed to score more then 60 points. If the winner of the episode was resident host Milan, money prize would stay in the show and was doubled for the next episode. If the winner was other contestant, he/she would collect the prize in the amount of initial amount multiplied with the number of episodes where Milan was the winner. The initial amount was 25.000 EUR paid in RSD currency.
imdb.title: Izadji na crtu
